name: Sussy Beans: The Game About Sussy Beans
name_original: Sussy Beans: The Game About Sussy Beans
description:
Sussy Beans is a game about a bean on its quest to take someone's coins. This was a tiny project and if you dare criticize my work then I shall see you in hell court, bucko. If you are wondering who the coins belong to then idk write some fanfics about the beans and the coin owners. Oh, and did I mention that he likes wall jumping? Note: The beans in the game were not harmed in the making of the game.  Controls: A to go left D to go right Space Bar to Jump Right-Click to Restart Credits: Me

Tip: If the game isn't working then alt-f4
